title: Omni GPT
message.uploadDoc.error.fileNotSupport: Sorry, we do not support '.{fileExtension}' file format yet.
message.uploadDoc.error.uploadError: Sorry, we encountered an error while processing your request. Please try again later.
message.account.form.error.name: Please input your name!
message.account.success.title: Your phone number has been updated
message.account.success.explain: You can now use your new number to connect with OmniGPT on WhatsApp.
message.account.language.title: Your changes have been saved.
message.account.language.explain: Your changes might take a while to show everywhere
signIn.title: Enter your email to start using
welcome.title: Welcome to OmniGPT!
welcome.subTitle: We sent an email to {email} Click the button in the email to continue on your way
welcome.explain: Please note that the link will expire after one hour for security purposes.
notice.welcome.title: Welcome to OmniGPT
notice.welcome.explain1: The first platform that allows you to connect with your ChatGPT from anywhere while you collaborate with anyone.
notice.welcome.explain2: We currently provide web and WhatsApp support but we will be soon expanding our integrations to tools such as Slack, Notion, Jira and many more! Stay tuned!
notice.introduce.title: Powered by ChatGPT
notice.introduce.explain1: We use ChatGPT Pro as a model. Thanks to our agreement with OpenAI we are able to use their AI technology to build a better way to use it.
notice.introduce.explain2: Not only that but our partnership also comes with a very good deal which allow us to bring you an amazing price. Click Continue to learn more about it.
notice.price.title: First month is FREE!
notice.price.explain1: We're dedicated to making AI available to everyone, and as a testament to our commitment, we offer you a 30-day free trial. Feel free to cancel anytime, no strings attached. Don’t miss this chance to unlock the full power of OmniGPT.
notice.price.explain2: Don’t miss this chance to unlock the full power of OmniGPT.
notice.payment.failure.title: Your subscription payment failed
notice.payment.failure.explain1: There might have been an issue with your payment method. Please try again with a different payment method.
notice.payment.failure.explain2: Don't worry, your subscription won't be canceled immediately, and you'll have some time to fix the payment.
notice.payment.failure.thankyou: Thank you for using our service, and we hope to see you again soon!
notice.lock.title: Your subscription has expired
notice.lock.explain1: To continue using OmniGPT, please subscribe.
notice.lock.explain2: If you do not subscribe, your account will be locked and you will not be able to access your data or use the service.
notice.lock.thankyou: We appreciate your support and thank you for choosing OmniGPT.
notice.whatsapp.title: Your email has already been confirmed
notice.whatsapp.subTitle: You can now log in and enjoy OmniGPT
notice.whatsapp.content: For a better experience, you can connect to WhatsApp and chat with OmniGPT on your WhatsApp number for seamless communication.
notice.whatsapp.explain: If you prefer to connect later, you can do so in the settings page.
chatgpt.welcome: Hello! How can I help you today?
chatgpt.introducenDoc: Tell me what is this document about in one sentence that not more than 12 words and ask me: Do you need help with this document?
